segments.text: I think you are an excellent person . Honestly speaking , you are very suitable for this job
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much for your evaluation . I also like this job very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to know your earliest available entry time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , let me think ... Maybe two months later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's too late . If you could get the job , could you start a little earlier ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry I can't , because I haven't finished my thesis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When do you usually require the new employee to start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Within two weeks , because the new employees need to receive induction training .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will make an arrangement for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you can come to our company to work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will give you an exact reply as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will keep this position for you for one week .
segments.speaker: S1
